price: 24. Nabiyow Ku Rabbih meklal isbiraay, korosuk dambit kaxaxah yan marih yab moggolinaay hinnay koroosannuu kee maxqawitit caddok tatreh yan marih yab moggolin.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā tuṭiʿ min'hum āthiman aw kafūran
